mapper.select: select bi_seq,bi_al_seq,bi_bc_seq, bi_title,bi_author,bi_page,bi_price,bi_stock,bi_like,bi_reg_dt, bi_catP, bi_catC,al_name as bi_account from (select bi_seq,bi_al_seq,bi_bc_seq, bi_title,bi_author,bi_page,bi_price,bi_stock,bi_like,bi_reg_dt, bc_parent_category as bi_catP,bc_child_category as bi_catC from book_info a join book_cat b on a.bi_bc_seq =b.bc_seq)c join account_list d on c.bi_al_seq = d.al_seq where bi_title like #{keyword} order by bi_seq desc limit 30 offset #{offset}
select bi_seq,bi_al_seq,bi_bc_seq, bi_title,bi_author,bi_page,bi_price,al_name as bi_account from book_info a join account_list b on a.bi_al_seq = b.al_seq where bi_seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from book_info where bi_title like #{keyword}
select bi_seq from book_info order by bi_seq desc limit 1
